Articles.Content:
I noticed this: ![screenshot11.png](https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-I0LxWB2hS1s/VV9ekLsIiAI/AAAAAAAAGfs/gMI6cx3Sq6s/w1476-h903-no/screenshot11.png)

which appears to be vab symmetry in sph. I could do three, four etc symmetries as well. A new feature that I don't understand, or a glitch/bug...?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-22T19:00:15Z" title="05/22/2015 07:00  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 22, 2015</time> by kurja**
Default [binding](http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Key_bindings) is 'r' to toggle VAB/SPH symmetry. Introduced in 0.90.
Well, damn. Did not know that. Must have hit it accidentally when rotating a part.
